Body:
Is there any straightforward way of identifying transitive verbs (or sentences containing transitive constructions) in an BrE English text?

I've looked into semantic shallow parsers, such as Semafor, but these don't seem to offer the straightforward approach I'm looking for.
Title: Is there an automatic way of identifying transitive verbs in Computational Linguistics?

LastEditedUser.AboutMe:
Travelling armchair linguist.

Never studied in an institution but read books and web with probably more breadth than depth.

Always on the road surviving in a strange foreign language, currently Mongolian and Mandarin Chinese.

And I collect dictionaries.
